about_the_game:
If you've already executed double jumps, daring dashes, graceful hovers, and glided through vibrant levels—immersing yourself in the fantastical combos inspired by a world of robots, computers, and technology—there's still more to uncover in Byteland.

This artbook offers an exclusive behind-the-scenes glimpse into the characters, setting, insights, and the expansive world of Boti: Byteland Overclocked. Dive in and explore the creative process behind this unique blend of platforming and fresh innovation, witnessing how it evolved from concept to the captivating game you've just conquered!
detailed_description:

*languages with full audio support
